command_line: addthreads=${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} && (( addthreads-- )) &&   addmemory=${GALAXY_MEMORY_MB_PER_SLOT:-768} && ((addmemory=addmemory*75/100)) &&   ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/1/2/dataset_3126dbe6-1db8-485e-a4ed-5c27a2e06264.dat' reference.fa && samtools faidx reference.fa &&   ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/e/e/0/dataset_ee0f498e-c16e-4b75-9d08-e0ae7caaf752.dat' infile &&         samtools view -@ $addthreads -C      -o outfile  --output-fmt-option no_ref   -T 'reference.fa' -t 'reference.fa.fai'   infile
